PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xADAA47LEVELING NOTES^7^7 ^7^7
^xD02090Guide by ^xD02090animeprincess^7 ^x3F6DB3^7^xD02090https://www.twitch.tv/animeprincess https://www.youtube.com/@anime.princess^7 ^xD02090https://discord.gg/anime-princess-111244942860460032^7
^x70FF70SUMMARY^7: This is a budget leaguestart progression for pathfinder Poison Concoction / Pconc of Bouncing. The endgame gearing is pretty tame and this build can be played in SSF or Trade.
^x70FF70ACT 1 talkreigh regex^7 -\w-.-|g-g-|-g-g|g-.-g|g-g|nne|rint|s:.+bow
^x70FF70LEVELING FILTER^7: https://www.pathofexile.com/account/view-profile/xsnowingx-1952/item-filters use the AP leveling pconc pathfinder filter
^x70FF70BANDITS^7: Alira for 15% res
^x70FF70ASCENDANCY ORDER:^7^7 Nature's Reprisal -> Master Toxicist -> Nature's Adrenaline -> Master Surgeon
^x70FF70IMPORTANT TIPS:^7
-Always use the highest level life flasks available. Our damage is calculated off the total amount of life that the flask is able to provide. -Use the gambling vendors in order to help with gear upgrades during the campaign!! Remember that EVA bases bias towards green sockets, ES biases blue, and ARMOR biases red, and you can gamble hybrid bases as well.
^x70FF70LEVELING GUIDE:^7
^x70FF70--------------------------------ACT 1- BOW START----------------------------------------
^xADAA47^7create your character, on a Ranger.
kill Hillock, enter town
^x70FF70Caustic Arrow - Mirage Archer^7 - ^x70FF70Momentum Support^7^7^7 (order of importance)
^x70FF70Shrapnel Ballista - Pierce Support^7
^x70FF70Snipers Mark^7 ^7(it is a permanent debuff on bosses and only has to be pressed once)
^x70FF70Burning Arrow - Manaforged Arrows^7 (optional automated damage)
^x7070FFFrostblink^7 (Buy ASAP to keep at low level, so we don't have to get Int on gear)
^xE05030Shield Charge^7^7 ( BUY SHIELD CHARGE ASAP AFTER MUD FLATS BECAUSE THE STR REQ GOES UP IF U POSTPONE THIS. we will not use it until level 12)
^xADAA47 ^x70FF70--------------------------------ACT 1- PCONC SWAP----------------------------------------^7
^xADAA47At level 12, we unlock the Poison Concoction gem, AFTER entering The Cavern of Wrath, and will want to get rid of all our bow gems in favor of this setup^7
^x70FF70Poisonous Concoction - Volley - Void Manip^7 - ^x70FF70Chance to Poison^7 (order of importance)
^xE05030Shield Charge (lv1) - ^x70FF70Faster Attacks - Momentum^7 ^7 ^x70FF70Withering Step^7 (debuff hard bosses by walking on top of them, to increase dmg)
^x7070FFClarity^7^7 (you may not initially have the Int to use this, but we will path towards int soon)
^x70FF70Precision^7 (provides accuracy for pconc. do not need to constantly level this up as it adds reservation cost. occasionally check your accuracy in the stats page, and level as needed)
^xADAA47
^x70FF70--------------------------------ACT 2--------------------------------------------------------------^7^7
^x70FF70^x70FF70Herald of Agony^7
^x70FF70Arctic Armor^7 (this is a good defensive aura if you can fit it in. when we get mana leech on the tree, clarity becomes useless and we can drop it)
^x70FF70Blood Rage ^7(optional skill that increases damage and gives leech)
^x70FF70--------------------------------ACT 3--------------------------------------------------------------^7^7 ^7 ^x7070FFDespair^7 (self cast on bosses)
^x7070FFMalevolence^7 (useful aura in the endgame, not needed now)
^x70FF70Grace^7^7 / ^x70FF70Haste^7 (defensive / offensive aura decision. pick one) use this after grabbing the Charisma passive. can drop arctic armor if you need to)
^x70FF70Plague Bearer^7 (extra damage, works great with^x7070FF Increased Area of Effect^7 if you have the gem slot for it)
^x70FF70--------------------------------ACT 4--------------------------------------------------------------^7^7
Pconc - ^x70FF70Greater Volley^7 - Void Manip^7 - ^x7070FF^7^x7070FFUnbound Ailments^7^7 - Chance to Poison
^xADAA47*Note: you can only get Unbound Ailments from either Siosa in Library Act 3, or Lily in Act 6. I will opt to skip library and use Chance to Poison instead, up until act 6 when I get it from Lily. I want to mention unbound ailments because it IS a much better support gem, and if you don't mind doing Library quest its worth using.^7
After Act 4 you can just blast your way thru the rest of the campaign, and not worry about anymore gem swaps!
^x70FF70ENDGAME GEARING^7 The build suggests a few common uniques. Some substitutions:
^x70FF70Gloves^7: ^xAF6025The Embalmer^7 is a very common unique that can substitute for a 5L / 6L early on in endgame progression. Even when you eventually do get a 6L, the glove still provides poison duration, which is a good damage stat, so you can keep wearing it until you need to swap to rare gloves to fix your other stats.
^x70FF70Body Armor^7: ^xAF6025Lightning Coil^7, or ^xAF6025Doppelganger Guise^7, or ^xFFFF77Rare Evasion armor with Phys taken as eldrith implicit^7
^x70FF70Amulet^7: ^xAF6025Fury Valve^7, or ^xFFFF77Rare Amulet with Damage over time Multiplier and Life^7
^x70FF70Shield^7: ^xAF6025Dawnbreaker^7 is a common Searing Exarch drop, and is a cheap source of phys to ele. Prioritize the phys taken as fire roll above all else. ^xAF6025Lepers Alm's^7 has more damage and less phys mit than Dawnbreaker. I would prefer Dawnbreaker shield until I have a decent defensive Body armor, then I would swap to this shield to boost up my damage for harder content. ^xFFFF77Rare Shaper Shield with life gain on block^7 can be another option here. Pristine Fossils would be a good way to craft this.
^x70FF70Flasks^7: ^xAF6025Rumi's^7 is a good source of block and coupled with Dawnbreaker and our anoint Aggresstive Bastion, puts us very close to block cap ^x7070FFSulphur Flask^7 is an option for more damage ^x7070FFTopaz Flask^7 is another option if we are using Lightning Coil and do not need the extra block
^x70FF70Rest of Gear^7: The rest of the gear should just fix your stats. Ele Res, Chaos Res, Strength, a Suppression Roll. Prioritize evasion bases as we are scaling this stat, and the 15% suppress mastery requires evasion helm, boot, glove. To acquire powerful SSF gear, I suggest sending Crimson Ore and Bars to Te Onui with your Kingsmarch ships, which will return well-rolled evasion gear. I was also using Faustus to gamble for my evasion gear, which has a good chance of being well-rolled.
^x70FF70ENDGAME GEMS^7
Obviously we already have the gems all shown in the skills tab, but for some context:
Swap ^x70FF70Blood Rage^7 to ^x70FF70Culling Strike^7 support for the important endgame boss fights. You can shield charge to cull them quickly, and blood rage is a mapping skill only.
Awakened gems are NOT mandatory, but I have included them to make sure you are aware that they are good upgrades to aim for. I did not use them to clear all the void stones in my practice GSF run last week.
^x7070FFAwakened Unbound Ailments^7, ^x70FF70Awakened Void Manipulation, Awakened Vicious Projectiles^7
^x70FF70POISON CONCOCTION OF BOUNCING SWAP^7 This entails prioritizing # of projectiles as well as the Projectile Mastery for inc damage per chain. There is also a Projectile Damage medium cluster that can be chaos spam crafted to get the 'Follow-Through' node, which gives us alot of damage. Obviously we also want to have both Greater Volley and Greater Multiple Projectiles supports when we swap to this gem. Having all these projectiles will put strain on your life flasks, which is why the tree has support for regaining life flask charges. (All these changes are already noted in the Skill and Tree tabs for the Pconc Swap, which I did after campaign but if you want you can do it beforehand.
^x70FF70PANTHEON^7: MAJOR: Brine King for Freeze immunity MINOR: Gruthkul for phys mitigation, altho this choice is flexible depending on your weakness.
^x70FF70 ^x70FF70CONCLUSION^7:
I will be streaming this start live on twitch. I will be posting build updates that take this past this budget starter guide on ^xE05030Youtube^7. I plan to eventually transition this character into ^xD02090<<<VIPER STRIKE OF THE MAMBA>>>^7, and will be making a transition guide on ^xE05030Youtube^7^7^7 for this. This is a pconc guide so if you want to make that Mamba transition with me you will get support for that in a dedicated future video guide.
My ingame chat channel is /global 8686
Feel free to ask for help in twitch chat, or in my discord community (link can be found at the top of this notes page).
^x70FF70^xADAA47^xFFFF77Hope to see you around in Breach 2.0!!!!^7^7^7 -animeprincess
^x70FF70MISC FAQ^7:
^x70FF70map regex?^7
i do not like cannot leech and monsters avoid poison. the regex to avoid these is:
"!eec|on,"
^x70FF70charges are not configured in pob?^7
We get endurance charge on kill via anoint, and frenzy on kill if you remember to press Blood Rage at the start of the map. I am not including these in the POB because it's not going to affect boss damage, but we are primarily going to be mapping so yes you will usually have charges
^x70FF70do we need tattoos?^7
You will ideally have 1 avoid stun tattoo to push us from 96 to 100% stun avoidance. Stun immunity is very important when doing endgame bossing, where a shaper ball stunning you could mean the difference between getting hit once and walking it off, or dying. You may also need 1 poison chance tattoo if you do not opt to get it on the glove eldritch implicit
